688960.name: Cynoclept: The Game Soundtrack
688960.description:
Couldn't get enough of the shredding main menu music within Cynoclept: The Game? Well you can get it now as an extra DLC along side the game itself! Created by our very own member of the team, Cynoclept, this acts as his official debut into the progressive scene with his song, Biocide.

About Cynoclept:

Cynoclept is back with his fourth studio EP, Biocide. Biocide follows Embrace The Chaos (2015), Deathstalker (2014), and The Purge (2012) in further cementing Cynoclept’s status as one of the leading lights of melodic metalcore. With the release of this record, Cynoclept is creating an everlasting legacy to influence his successors. “With the release of Cynoclept, we hope to re-evaluate the era of instrumental metalcore,” says frontman/guitarist Brandon Lloyd.

Tracklisting:


  • 1. Biocide
  • 2. Fallout
  • 3. Genesis
  • 4. Fate
  • 5. Repeat
688960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
